HWAPI_BOOKMARK_COLLECTION_PROPS Struct Reference
[Bookmark Functions]

Bookmark Properties Definition. More...

#include <hwapi.h>

Data Fields

WORD cbSize
 Size of this structure in bytes.
TCHAR cDescription [80]
 Collection Description.
TCHAR cAuthor [80]
 Collection Author.
TCHAR cStructureLib [256]
 Collection's assoicated structure library.

Detailed Description

Note:
The cbSize must be set when getting and setting properties
If a file name is specified for cStructureLib instead of a full path, Hex Workshop will attempt to load the structure library from the default structure library directory.
See also:
hwBookmarkCollectionGetProps
hwBookmarkCollectionSetProps
